abstract: The spider's web umbrella from Lulu Guinness can go from rain shield to costume accessory in a snap.
snippet: The spider's web umbrella from Lulu Guinness can go from rain shield to costume accessory in a snap.
lead_paragraph: THIS Lulu Guinness umbrella can switch from rain shield to festive costume accessory in a snap. That cute umbrella you've never found and the answer to this year's weary Halloween costume? Score!
